请在未过期前完成续期_当过期时间超过15天_还未进行续期的DataToken将自: Please complete the renewal before it expires. When the expiration time exceeds 15 days,the DataToken that has not been renewed will be automatically removed.
此操作将交接您拥有的全部权限_包括但不限于: This operation will transfer all the permissions you have_ including but not limited to
全部原始数据以及结果数据的管理权限: Management rights for all raw data and result data
调用DataAPI授权码的管理权限: Management authority to call the DataAPI authorization code
数据开发中自定义函数的管理权限: Management permissions for custom functions in data development
